curam.util.rules
Class ResultTextDecoder

java.lang.Object
  curam.util.rules.ResultTextDecoder

public final class ResultTextDecoder
extends java.lang.Object

This class constructs the result text using the rule set document and the rules engine execution flow bits.

Method Summary
static ResultBuffer decode(java.lang.String ruleSetIdentifier, byte[] flowBits, byte[] resultBits, EvidenceList evidenceStr, RulesEngine.RulesEngineMode rulesEngineMode)
          Decodes the bit string to result text.
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Method Detail

decode

public static ResultBuffer decode(java.lang.String ruleSetIdentifier,
                                  byte[] flowBits,
                                  byte[] resultBits,
                                  EvidenceList evidenceStr,
                                  RulesEngine.RulesEngineMode rulesEngineMode)
                           throws AppException,
                                  InformationalException
Decodes the bit string to result text.

Parameters:
ruleSetIdentifier - rule set ID.
flowBits - byte array containing flow in the binary format.
resultBits - byte array containing result text in the binary format.
evidenceStr - evidence text.
rulesEngineMode - rules engine execution mode.
Returns:
result text as string buffer.
Throws:
AppException - ID_UNKNOWN_RULESET - if unable to fetch the rule set.
AppException - ID_DATAITEM_MISSING - if data item is missing.
AppException - ID_RULES_EXPRESSION_PARSER - if unable to parse the expression.
AppException - Generic Exception Signature.
InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.
